Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Vista Odín in Playa de Palma (Las Maravillas), you'll be convenient to Palma Aquarium and El Arenal Beach. This hotel is within close proximity of Port of El Arenal and Aqualand.

Rooms
Stay in one of 119 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a seasonal outdoor pool, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Vista Odín, or stop in at a snack bar/deli. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the hotel pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage.
